item.title: Copy Weight To Verts Tool
item.description: Color Changer is an updated version of a mel script I’ve been using in my workflow. I also took this as a challenge to build a gui using cmds. You also now have the ability to easily change the color on the shape of the control. Github:

item.title: About Me
item.description: About I’ve been an Animaiton Industry Professional for over 10 years, and spent a majority of that time as a Rigging Artist. I really enjoy the gratifcaiton I get from solving technical problems. Tools I’m Using Maya, UE5, Blender PyCharm/VSCode Vim Git Rocky Linux Contact Me Email: rigger@anthonylynch.xyz

item.title: Tools
item.description: Here is a collection of Maya tools I created during daily work. Its only a few for now, but I have a few in the works that will be release soon. GitHub Repo: Download Name Description Github Color Changer For changing the color on controls. More Info Github Copy Vert Weight Tool for selecting and copying weight. More Info If you appreciate any of these and are feeling generous feel free to Donate
